result.execSummary:
Adam Dean Schottle was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Adam Dean Schottle was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam Dean Schottle

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

CO: EJL, RPR: Val Deiss, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Alexis S. Mckinley,  DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea,  DF:  Adam Dean Schottle appeared from jail. Defendant would like to waive extradition. Court confirms address. Defendant has a felony warrant out of Washington County MN.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for May 4, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
